definitions.definition: A tendency to express warm, compassionate feelings
definitions.example: When the lovers were together, their cold indifference gave way to love and tenderness.

definitions.definition: Concern for the feelings or welfare of others
definitions.example: When they saw the poor orphans, they were overwhelmed with tenderness for them.

definitions.definition: Pain or discomfort when an affected area is touched
definitions.example: He noted her extreme tenderness when he touched the bruise on her thigh.
